name: peg-replicator
description: PEG Replicator is a tool to provide concurrency functionality to a TCP / UDP type connection for IoT devices. It can have various purposes: - Replication of information per se - Diversification of functionality of the same source of information - Asynchronous treatment of non-dependent data - Forward data to mirror servers or other platforms - Others

scripts.test: echo "The correct way to Full Testing this Tool is documented in: https://github.com/ocruzcarrillo/peg-replicator" && exit 1

author: ISC Omar Cruz Carrillo
